tool_description: Generates alerts and notifications based on performance thresholds, anomalies, and significant changes in review and sales metrics.

current_metrics.description: Current values of metrics being monitored

metric_names.description: Names of metrics corresponding to current_metrics

alert_types.description: Alert types: above_threshold, below_threshold, or change_threshold

alert_severity.description: Alert severity level: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All input arrays must have the same length.
Invalid alert type: Alert types must be 'above_threshold', 'below_threshold', or 'change_threshold'.
Invalid severity level: Severity must be 'low', 'medium', or 'high'.
Missing previous values: Previous values required when using 'change_threshold' alert type.
usage: Provide current_metrics, metric_names, threshold_values, and alert_types arrays. Include previous_values for change-based alerts.
